channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is The Giant OpenAI-AMD Deal Another Sign of an AI Bubble?

item.title: If You Get This Amazon Prime Message, It’s Always An Attack
item.description: Delete every one of these Amazon Prime messages immediately.

item.title: The Hidden Reason For Americans’ Declining Trust In Their Doctors
item.description: Gallup polling shows just 44% of Americans rate the quality of care they receive as good or excellent, the weakest showing since Gallup began asking t...

item.title: Pope Leo XIV Blesses Huge 20,000-Year-Old Chunk Of Greenland Ice
item.description: Artist Olafur Eliasson transported the ice slab to the Raising Hope climate conference in Rome to call attention to the threat of fast-melting glacier...

item.title: These Inspiring Women Each Raised 21 Puppies To Become Guide Dogs
item.description: In August, Debbie Scheblein and Bonnie Moore joined The Seeing Eye 21 Club for raising at least 21 puppies for the nonprofit guide dog school.

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations
item.description: When we win by having someone else lose, we set up a conflict. It’s clear, direct but not generative. But when we win by confronting our fear, everyon...

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.
